# Code of Conduct

We follow the [Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct v2.1](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct/). By participating, you are expected to uphold this code.

## Enforcement
- Report unacceptable behavior to: <bbmorten@gmail.com>
- Maintainers will review and respond as appropriate.

For more details on scope and enforcement guidelines, see the official [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/).
